sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-reading-medical-faq', templateUrl: './reading-medical-faq.page.html', styleUrls: ['./reading-medical-faq.page.scss'], }) export class ReadingMedicalFaqPage implements OnInit { constructor(private router:Router) { } ngOnInit() { } back(){ this.router.navigate(["./medical-faqs"]) } }
Medical FAQs

Patient Assessment

What is the first responsibility of the EMT-B on the scene of an emergency before starting to assess the patient?

SCENE SIZE-UP 1. Dispatch information 2. Body Substance Isolation 3. Scene Safety/Scene hazards 4. Mechanism of injury/ Nature of illness 5. Number of patients 6. Additional resources needed 7. C-Spine Immobilization
